model.name: Правила
model.description: description['code'] = obj.code description['name'] = obj.name description['file_name'] = '%s.%s' % (obj.code, 'json') description['file_path'] = 'rule' description['attrs'] = { 'code': obj.code, 'name': obj.name, }
model.import:

obj.data = json.loads(file_data) obj.code = object_attrs['code'] obj.name = object_attrs['name'] obj._isImport = True obj.save()
